entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 8:02 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:02 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
